# Exercise 1

Install all the packages we'll need for the course:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "nycflights13", "maps", "PairedData", "olsrr",
                   "caret", "class", "gdata", "xlsx", "Foreign", "RMySQL"))
```
